_exec_summary.SummaryText: g=360/></w:pPr><w:rPr><w:rFonts w:ascii=Wingdings w:h-ansi=Wingdings w:cs=Wingdings w:hint=default/></w:rPr></w:lvl></w:listDef><w:list w:ilfo=1><w:ilst w:val=1/></w:list><w:list w:ilfo=2><w:ilst w:val=0/></w:list></w:lists><w:styles><w:versionOfBuiltInStylenames w:val=4/><w:latentStyles w:defLockedState=off w:latentStyleCount=156/><w:style w:type=paragraph w:default=on w:styleId=Normal><w:name w:val=Normal/><w:rsid w:val=00C25EA0/><w:rPr><wx:font wx:val=Times New Roman/><w:sz w:val=24/><w:sz-cs w:val=24/><w:lang w:val=EN-US w:fareast=EN-US w:bidi=AR-SA/></w:rPr></w:style><w:style w:type=character w:default=on w:styleId=DefaultParagraphFont><w:name w:val=Default Paragraph Font/><w:semiHidden/></w:style><w:style w:type=table w:default=on w:styleId=TableNormal><w:name w:val=Normal Table/><wx:uiName wx:val=Table Normal/><w:semiHidden/><w:rPr><wx:font wx:val=Times New Roman/></w:rPr><w:tblPr><w:tblInd w:w=0 w:type=dxa/><w:tblCellMar><w:top w:w=0 w:type=dxa/><w:left w:w=108 w:type=dxa/><w:bottom w:w=0 w:type=dxa/><w:right w:w=108 w:type=dxa/></w:tblCellMar></w:tblPr></w:style><w:style w:type=list w:default=on w:styleId=NoList><w:name w:val=No List/><w:semiHidden/></w:style></w:styles><w:shapeDefaults><o:shapedefaults v:ext=edit spidmax=2050/><o:shapelayout v:ext=edit><o:idmap v:ext=edit data=1/></o:shapelayout></w:shapeDefaults><w:docPr><w:view w:val=print/><w:zoom w:percent=100/><w:dontDisplayPageBoundaries/><w:displayBackgroundShape/><w:proofState w:spelling=clean w:grammar=clean/><w:attachedTemplate w:val=/><w:defaultTabStop w:val=720/><w:doNotHyphenateCaps/><w:punctuationKerning/><w:characterSpacingControl w:val=DontCompress/><w:optimizeForBrowser/><w:validateAgainstSchema w:val=off/><w:saveInvalidXML w:val=off/><w:ignoreMixedContent w:val=off/><w:alwaysShowPlaceholderText w:val=off/><w:doNotUnderlineInvalidXML/><w:compat><w:breakWrappedTables

/><w:snapToGridInCell/><w:wrapTextWithPunct/><w:useAsianBreakRules/><w:dontGrowAutofit/></w:compat></w:docPr><w:body><wx:sect><w:p><w:pPr><w:jc w:val=center/><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:sz w:val=32/><w:sz-cs w:val=32/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:sz w:val=32/><w:sz-cs w:val=32/></w:rPr><w:t>EXECUTIVE SUMMARY</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:jc w:val=center/><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:sz w:val=32/><w:sz-cs w:val=32/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:sz w:val=32/><w:sz-cs w:val=32/></w:rPr><w:t>FIRST ENERGY BRUCE MANSFIELD PLANT</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:jc w:val=center/><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:sz w:val=32/><w:sz-cs w:val=32/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:sz w:val=32/><w:sz-cs w:val=32/></w:rPr><w:t>RMP PLAN</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:pPr><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:u w:val=single/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:u w:val=single/></w:rPr><w:t>Background</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:r><w:t>First Energy operates a coal fired electrical generation plant, known as the Bruce Mansfield Plant (BMP), in Shippingport, Pennsylvania.  In order to reduce NO</w:t></w:r><w:r><w:rPr><w:vertAlign w:val=subscript/></w:rPr><w:t>x</w:t></w:r><w:r><w:t> air emissions, BMP installed in 2003 a Selective Catalytic Reduction (SCR) system.  This system removes NO</w:t></w:r><w:r><w:rPr><w:vertAlign w:val=subscript/></w:rPr><w:t>x</w:t></w:r><w:r><w:t> by catalytically reacting NO</w:t></w:r><w:r><w:rPr><w:vertAlign w:val=subscript/></w:rPr><w:t>x</w:t></w:r><w:r><w:t> with Ammonia to form Nitrogen and water.  This system has operated since September 2003 during the ozone season (May through September).  The process is covered by the EPA Risk Management Program (RMP) rules due to the presence of 29 % Aqueous Ammonia.</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:r><w:t>The covered process includes:  rail car unloading, tank truck unloading, storage, and SCR feed.  There are six storage tanks that contain 57,

000 gallons each (95% capacity).</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:r><w:t>BMP operations are also covered by other regulations such as the PADEP Aboveground Storage Tanks (AST) rules and air regulations, EPA SPCC rules, and OSHA.</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:pPr><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:u w:val=single/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:u w:val=single/></w:rPr><w:t>Overview of the RMP Prevention Program </w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:r><w:t>BMP is a Program 2 site but it has some elements of a Program 3 site.  BMP uses a management of change and pre-startup safety review procedure as well as tri-annual compliance audit following EPA guidelines.</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:r><w:t>Process protections are primarily those measures that will reduce, prevent or minimize a release from happening or, if it did happen, minimize the consequences of that threat.    These include:</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:listPr><w:ilvl w:val=0/><w:ilfo w:val=1/><wx:t wx:val=Â· wx:wTabBefore=360 wx:wTabAfter=240/><wx:font wx:val=Symbol/></w:listPr><w:tabs><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=0/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=1440/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2160/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2880/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=3600/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=4320/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5040/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5760/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=6480/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7200/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7920/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=8640/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=9360/></w:tabs><w:suppressAutoHyphens/><w:overflowPunct w:val=off/><w:autoSpaceDE w:val=off/><w:autoSpaceDN w:val=off/><w:adjustRightInd w:val=off/><w:spacing w:before=120 w:after=120 w:line=240 w:line-rule=at-least/><w:jc w:val=both/><w:textAlignment w:val=baseline/></w:pPr><w:r><w:t>Training on operations, emergencies etc.</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:tabs><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=0/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=1440/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2160/><w:t

ab w:val=left w:pos=2880/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=3600/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=4320/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5040/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5760/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=6480/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7200/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7920/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=8640/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=9360/></w:tabs><w:suppressAutoHyphens/><w:overflowPunct w:val=off/><w:autoSpaceDE w:val=off/><w:autoSpaceDN w:val=off/><w:adjustRightInd w:val=off/><w:spacing w:before=120 w:after=120 w:line=240 w:line-rule=at-least/><w:ind w:left=360/><w:jc w:val=both/><w:textAlignment w:val=baseline/></w:pPr><w:r><w:tab wx:wTab=1080 wx:tlc=none wx:cTlc=17/><w:t>-All operators have refresher training at least every 3 years.</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:listPr><w:ilvl w:val=0/><w:ilfo w:val=1/><wx:t wx:val=Â· wx:wTabBefore=360 wx:wTabAfter=240/><wx:font wx:val=Symbol/></w:listPr><w:tabs><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=0/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=1440/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2160/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2880/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=3600/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=4320/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5040/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5760/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=6480/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7200/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7920/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=8640/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=9360/></w:tabs><w:suppressAutoHyphens/><w:overflowPunct w:val=off/><w:autoSpaceDE w:val=off/><w:autoSpaceDN w:val=off/><w:adjustRightInd w:val=off/><w:spacing w:before=120 w:after=120 w:line=240 w:line-rule=at-least/><w:jc w:val=both/><w:textAlignment w:val=baseline/></w:pPr><w:r><w:t>Regular maintenance/SOPSÂ Â Â Â Â Â Â  </w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:listPr><w:ilvl w:val=0/><w:ilfo w:val=1/><wx:t wx:val=Â· wx:wTabBefore=360 wx:wTabAfter=240/><wx:font wx:val=Symbol/></w:listPr><w:tabs><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=0/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=1440/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=

2160/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2880/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=3600/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=4320/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5040/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5760/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=6480/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7200/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7920/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=8640/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=9360/></w:tabs><w:suppressAutoHyphens/><w:overflowPunct w:val=off/><w:autoSpaceDE w:val=off/><w:autoSpaceDN w:val=off/><w:adjustRightInd w:val=off/><w:spacing w:before=120 w:after=120 w:line=240 w:line-rule=at-least/><w:jc w:val=both/><w:textAlignment w:val=baseline/></w:pPr><w:r><w:t>During deliveries, attendance by the operator is continuous until the delivery is complete,</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:listPr><w:ilvl w:val=0/><w:ilfo w:val=1/><wx:t wx:val=Â· wx:wTabBefore=360 wx:wTabAfter=240/><wx:font wx:val=Symbol/></w:listPr><w:tabs><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=0/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=1440/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2160/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2880/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=3600/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=4320/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5040/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5760/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=6480/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7200/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7920/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=8640/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=9360/></w:tabs><w:suppressAutoHyphens/><w:overflowPunct w:val=off/><w:autoSpaceDE w:val=off/><w:autoSpaceDN w:val=off/><w:adjustRightInd w:val=off/><w:spacing w:before=120 w:after=120 w:line=240 w:line-rule=at-least/><w:jc w:val=both/><w:textAlignment w:val=baseline/></w:pPr><w:r><w:t>No rail cars or tank trucks stored on site other than those in immediate use at the unloading station</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:listPr><w:ilvl w:val=0/><w:ilfo w:val=1/><wx:t wx:val=Â· wx:wTabBefore=360 wx:wTabAfter=240/><wx:font wx:val=Symbol/></w:listPr><w:tabs><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=0/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=1

se stations and service water hydrants (knock down Ammonia fumes) </w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:r><w:t>These are the major site security measures:</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:pPr><w:listPr><w:ilvl w:val=0/><w:ilfo w:val=2/><wx:t wx:val=Â· wx:wTabBefore=360 wx:wTabAfter=240/><wx:font wx:val=Symbol/></w:listPr><w:tabs><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=0/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=1440/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2160/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2880/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=3600/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=4320/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5040/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5760/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=6480/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7200/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7920/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=8640/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=9360/></w:tabs><w:suppressAutoHyphens/><w:spacing w:line=240 w:line-rule=at-least/><w:rPr><w:rFonts w:ascii=Times w:h-ansi=Times w:cs=Times/><wx:font wx:val=Times/><w:spacing w:val=-2/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w:rFonts w:ascii=Times w:h-ansi=Times w:cs=Times/><wx:font wx:val=Times/><w:spacing w:val=-2/></w:rPr><w:t>Fence with barbed wire on top surrounding the site</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:listPr><w:ilvl w:val=0/><w:ilfo w:val=2/><wx:t wx:val=Â· wx:wTabBefore=360 wx:wTabAfter=240/><wx:font wx:val=Symbol/></w:listPr><w:tabs><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=0/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=1440/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2160/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2880/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=3600/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=4320/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5040/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5760/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=6480/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7200/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7920/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=8640/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=9360/></w:tabs><w:suppressAutoHyphens/><w:spacing w:line=240 w:line-rule=at-least/><w:rPr><w:rFonts w:ascii=Times w:h-ansi=Times w:cs=Times/><wx:font wx:val=Times/><w:spacing w:val=-2/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w

:rFonts w:ascii=Times w:h-ansi=Times w:cs=Times/><wx:font wx:val=Times/><w:spacing w:val=-2/></w:rPr><w:t>Security cameras in selected areas</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:listPr><w:ilvl w:val=0/><w:ilfo w:val=2/><wx:t wx:val=Â· wx:wTabBefore=360 wx:wTabAfter=240/><wx:font wx:val=Symbol/></w:listPr><w:tabs><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=0/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=1440/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2160/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2880/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=3600/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=4320/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5040/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5760/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=6480/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7200/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7920/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=8640/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=9360/></w:tabs><w:suppressAutoHyphens/><w:spacing w:line=240 w:line-rule=at-least/><w:rPr><w:rFonts w:ascii=Times w:h-ansi=Times w:cs=Times/><wx:font wx:val=Times/><w:spacing w:val=-2/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w:rFonts w:ascii=Times w:h-ansi=Times w:cs=Times/><wx:font wx:val=Times/><w:spacing w:val=-2/></w:rPr><w:t>Main entrance staffed with guards on a 24 hour basis.</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:listPr><w:ilvl w:val=0/><w:ilfo w:val=2/><wx:t wx:val=Â· wx:wTabBefore=360 wx:wTabAfter=240/><wx:font wx:val=Symbol/></w:listPr><w:tabs><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=0/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=1440/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2160/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2880/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=3600/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=4320/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5040/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5760/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=6480/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7200/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7920/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=8640/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=9360/></w:tabs><w:suppressAutoHyphens/><w:spacing w:line=240 w:line-rule=at-least/><w:rPr><w:rFonts w:ascii=Times w:h-ansi=Times w:cs=Times/><wx:font wx:val=Times/><w:spacing w:val=-2/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:r

Pr><w:rFonts w:ascii=Times w:h-ansi=Times w:cs=Times/><wx:font wx:val=Times/><w:spacing w:val=-2/></w:rPr><w:t>All other gates are either locked or guarded but may be opened in the event of emergency egress from the inside.</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p><w:pPr><w:listPr><w:ilvl w:val=0/><w:ilfo w:val=2/><wx:t wx:val=Â· wx:wTabBefore=360 wx:wTabAfter=240/><wx:font wx:val=Symbol/></w:listPr><w:tabs><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=0/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=1440/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2160/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=2880/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=3600/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=4320/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5040/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=5760/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=6480/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7200/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=7920/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=8640/><w:tab w:val=left w:pos=9360/></w:tabs><w:suppressAutoHyphens/><w:spacing w:line=240 w:line-rule=at-least/><w:rPr><w:rFonts w:ascii=Times w:h-ansi=Times w:cs=Times/><wx:font wx:val=Times/><w:spacing w:val=-2/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w:rFonts w:ascii=Times w:h-ansi=Times w:cs=Times/><wx:font wx:val=Times/><w:spacing w:val=-2/></w:rPr><w:t>Warning signs</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:r><w:t>It is the policy of BMP to assure the safe operation of the facility which is designed and built to good engineering practices that incorporate methods or principles in accordance with applicable industry standards.  Some of these standards include ASME code for pressure piping, B31.3, and ASME Boiler and Pressure code, Section VIII.   </w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:pPr><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:u w:val=single/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:u w:val=single/></w:rPr><w:t>Accident History</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:r><w:t>There have been no accidents in the history of operation of the Ammonia system.</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:pPr><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:u w:val=single/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:u w

:val=single/></w:rPr><w:t>Emergency Response</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:r><w:t>There is a written emergency response plan that is coordinated with the Beaver County LEPC and the local fire departments.  There are periodic site drills.  Selected site response personnel are Hazwoper trained.    </w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:r><w:t>Emergency response planning has long been an integral part of operations at BMP.  Regulations under OSHA, EPA, Coast Guard, and PADEP have required the site to develop and implement procedures to plan for and respond to emergency situations at the plant whether due to natural disasters, storms, exposure to releases or harm/damage resulting from to flammable and explosive materials.  </w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p/><w:p/><w:p><w:pPr><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:u w:val=single/></w:rPr></w:pPr><w:r><w:rPr><w:b/><w:b-cs/><w:u w:val=single/></w:rPr><w:t>Planned Changes</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:r><w:t>An unloading arm will replace hose connections at the rail car unloading facility as of the end of 2008.  This will reduce the potential for leaks from hose leaks and replace the hoses with a solid piped connection.</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p><w:r><w:t>The Ammonia system will operate the whole year and not just the ozone season in the future.  There will be no increase in Aqueous Ammonia storage or processing rates.  Deliveries will now be made over the entire year.</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p/><w:p/><w:sectPr><w:pgSz w:w=12240 w:h=15840/><w:pgMar w:top=1440 w:right=1800 w:bottom=1440 w:left=1800 w:header=720 w:footer=720 w:gutter=0/><w:cols w:space=720/><w:docGrid w:line-pitch=360/></w:sectPr></wx:sect></w:body></w:wordDocument>
